purpose: Enable employees to request company-approved devices through a self-service Power App, triggering approval workflows and integrating with internal policies.

mvp_components.app_details: A self-service app for employees to browse and request devices, with integration to Azure AD for user data.

app_screens.screen_details: Allows users to browse available devices, view specs, photos, and availability, and filter by department-approved models.
Form for selecting a device, justifying business need, selecting urgency level, and auto-populating employee name/department.
Screen to review and confirm the order before submission.

mvp_components.flow_details: Workflow for managers to receive notifications and approve or reject device requests with comments within a 2 business day SLA.

flow_actions.action_details: Sends a notification to the manager when a new order request is submitted.
Allows managers to approve or reject the request and add comments.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows employees to view the status of their orders and receive email notifications at each step. Includes an optional Power BI dashboard for tracking.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Integrate a Power BI dashboard within the Canvas App for real-time tracking and notifications to enhance transparency and user engagement.

post_mvp_modules.details: Enables IT Administrators to update stock levels, mark orders as fulfilled, and link to the procurement system for inventory management.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the Canvas App with additional screens for IT Administrators to manage inventory, ensuring seamless integration with the procurement system.

constraints: Must use Power Apps Canvas App
Data must be stored in Dataverse
Approval process must use Power Automate
Device models filtered by department policy
App must support desktop + mobile usage
No external users (internal only via Azure AD)
integration_points: Power Automate for approvals and notifications
notes: The design should be clean and corporate with a responsive layout for phone and desktop. It should include dropdowns, cards, and status icons, and confirm the order screen before submission. The design must also be accessible (WCAG AA).
